x+x bīt itti x x x x x ša iqbû māt x x x x x āl kiššati šunu x x x x šarru ana šarri nukurti išappar x x ana x x ša māti x x x+x x x x ni-x x+x ina x x x x x x iddabbū x x x x x x x+x-u₂ ina x x+x x x x x x x x UD x ana x x x x x x x x x u šarru x x ana x x x x x x x x x x iškun x x x x x x x šarru li-x x x x x x x x x x-šu₂-nu x+x x x x ṭēme damqu x+x x x x x ileʾʾû ana {LU₂}x x x x 01 narkabtu ṭābu ina māti x x x x u mamma ana šarri ul x x x x mār Zabidu ša ultu x x x x ša qātē šarri šû kî libbu ša šarri bēlīya ṭābu x x x ša ana pīhati x x x x x ša šinīšu ma-ṣa-x x x x x x ša ultu x x x x x x x x x ša šarri x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x
